personal.name: Kartik Kumar Swarnkar
personal.aboutus: I specialize in utilizing MERN Stack to build modern web applications.
personal.aboutus1: I have expertise in designing and implementing APIs, managing server-side logic, integrating frontend and backend components, and optimizing application performance

about: Software Engineer possessing Comprehensive 6 years of experience as IT Professional
6+ years of experience as Node Js Developer
Hands on experience developing web-based applications with Node Js with JavaScript & Typescript, Express in specific with React Js, Next Js framework & Redux library.
Experience on Cross Platform Server & Client-Server side applications design and development using Javascript language
3+ years of experience as Python Development with Fast API
Experience on ORACLE, MySQL, MongoDB & SQL Server concepts. Also DB Design, DB normalization and writing SQL queries.

summary: Developed and optimized lead generation modules, improving performance and scalability for bulk data upload workflows.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs in Node.js for quotation generation, enhancing automation and reducing manual effort.
Integrated and utilized Next.js APIs for dynamic quotation management with improved frontend-backend interaction.
Diagnosed and resolved backend performance issues, refactoring code to improve API response time and maintainability.

Developed an infrastructure automation project using React.js for the front end and Node.js for the back end, streamlining workflows and improving efficiency through automation, using database Postgres DB.
Upgraded components by converting Figma designs to React code, utilizing Storybook for components, ensuring consistency and reusability in UI components in Node Js & React Js. Database using Sqlite
Created & Implemented RESTful API for Blockchain Exchange services
Creating detailed functional specifications, work-flow diagrams & relevant documentation.
Planning, Designing, Implementing and maintenance of API count & rate limit based applications
Developed a support system in React & Node Js for generating issues tickets
Developed Newsletter (Subscriber) Marketing Web Application in React, Node Js & MySQL
Developed Application, Server & Logs monitoring in React & Node Js
Developed the frontend in React Js using REST API built in Node Js which handles around 30K inventory system merchant users.
Work on Paytm, Razorpay & PayU Payment Gateway.
Work on DMT & UPI Payment System, Recharge & Bill Payment API
Developed a support system in React & Node Js for generating issues tickets
